title: Hedera HBAR Faces Sell-Off but Eyes $0.40 Surge in September 2025
description: Hedera has its own native cryptocurrency, HBAR, which is stirring the crypto waters, struggling with a 4-percent price drop to $0.218 as markets buzz with activity around it. With the volatile effect of Bitcoin spreading across the market, Hedera, with its exclusive hashgraph technology, which is faster and more efficient than traditional blockchains, stands out […]The post Hedera HBAR Faces Sell-Off but Eyes $0.40 Surge in September 2025 appeared first on ABC Money.

title: Can my family inherit my bitcoin after I die? What crypto investors must know
description: As more people invest in cryptocurrency, the number of people planning to pass on these assets when they die will also be increasing.

title: Crypto’s US Momentum, Trump Ties Steal Show at Hong Kong Event
description: The Bitcoin faithful gathered in Hong Kong last week, but all eyes and energy tilted west — toward the United States, now crypto’s once-unlikely command center.
